choices.name: ClearDebris
choices.choiceText: Has the site of the temporary use been cleared of all debris? Note: All debris must be cleared within five (5) of the end of the temporary use

choices.name: CrowdControl
choices.choiceText: Have adequate provisions for crowd control been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide plans for crowd control.

choices.name: FPOD
choices.choiceText: FPOD

choices.name: GTOD
choices.choiceText: GTOD

choices.name: Helps_limit_the_need_for_site_grading_or_revision_to_existing_drainage_patterns
choices.choiceText: Helps limit the need for site grading or revision to existing drainage patterns

value.stringValue: Helps limit the need for site grading or revision to existing drainage patterns

choices.name: Is_necessary_to_allow_for_proper_functioning_of_public_or_private_infrastructure
choices.choiceText: Is necessary to allow for proper functioning of public or private infrastructure

value.stringValue: Is necessary to allow for proper functioning of public or private infrastructure

choices.name: Is_required_to_compensate_for_some_unusual_aspect_of_the_site_or_the_proposed_de
choices.choiceText: Is required to compensate for some unusual aspect of the site or the proposed development that is not shared by landowners in general, including size or shape of the lot

value.stringValue: Is required to compensate for some unusual aspect of the site or the proposed development that is not shared by landowners in general, including size or shape of the lot

choices.name: LHOD
choices.choiceText: LHOD

choices.name: LightingOrElectrical
choices.choiceText: Is site lighting or electrical service needed to support the temporary use? Note: No lighting or electrical service shall be provided without an electrical permit.

choices.name: MSSD
choices.choiceText: MSSD

choices.name: No
choices.choiceText: No

choices.name: Not_Found
choices.choiceText: --RECORD NOT FOUND--

choices.name: Parking
choices.choiceText: Has adequate parking been provided? Note: Required parking for other uses must remain available

choices.name: Permission
choices.choiceText: Has written permission from the property owner has been obtained? (Complete the Ownerâ€™s Consent Form)

choices.name: RemainUnblocked
choices.choiceText: Is the temporary use located so that all fire lanes, pedestrian access and vehicular access points remain unblocked?

choices.name: Saves_healthy_existing_trees
choices.choiceText: Saves healthy existing trees

choices.name: TempStructure
choices.choiceText: Is the temporary use located in a temporary structure? Note: No structure shall be erected without a building permit.

choices.name: TrafficControl
choices.choiceText: Have adequate traffic controls measures been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide a maintenance of traffic plan.

choices.name: TrashSanitary
choices.choiceText: Have adequate provisions for trash disposal and sanitary facilities been provided? Note: Applicant may be required to provide additional information on the site plan.

choices.name: UDO
choices.choiceText: UDO

choices.name: WPOD
choices.choiceText: WPOD

choices.name: Yes
choices.choiceText: Yes
